Dear Mr. Lunday:
We are delighted to hear that your new station is about ready to com¬
mence operations, and I am happy to supply you with the information
you requested.
Dues for active membership in the NAEB, which cover the cost of the
above mentioned services and a subscription to the monthly Newsletter
(back copies of which were included with the material sent you), are
based on the power of the member stations, as follows:
Class A - 5 kw and over $50*00
Class B - 1 to ii.9 kw 25*00
Class C - Less than 1 kw -15.00
The above dues do not include use of the NAEB tape network, which sup¬
plies eight to ten hours of programming a week to those active members
paying an additional Network Assessment Fee. Due to recent action by
the NAEB Executive Committee, we are able to allow new members to take
three years to reach the full Assessment Fee (which is that fee indi¬
cated for the third year in the table below). Therefore, Network
Assessment Fees, also based on rated transmitter power (as above), are
